subject: Philosophy
title: Hard Determinism
description: Learn Hard Determinism in one minute.

hook.text: Every atom in your body follows the laws of physics. So does every thought you think.

buildup.text: Hard determinists say free will is an illusion. The universe is a chain of cause and effect.

discovery.text: Laplace imagined a demon that knows every particle's state. It could predict all of history.

twist.text: If your brain is atoms, then your decisions are physics. Praise and blame lose their meaning.

climax.text: Most people reject this instinctively. But no one has proven it wrong.

punchline.text: You didn't choose to read this. Physics did.

quiz.question: What thought experiment did Laplace propose?
options: A demon that could predict all events from particle data
